abstract: American Academy of Pediatrics strengthens its warning to parents of infants and toddlers to limit amount of time their children spend in front of any type of television and other video screens.
snippet: Video screen time provides no educational benefits for children under age 2 and leaves less room for activities that do, pediatricians say.
lead_paragraph: Video screen time provides no educational benefits for children under age 2 and leaves less room for activities that do, pediatricians say.

headline.main: Parents Urged Again to Limit TV for Youngest
headline.print_headline: Parents Urged Again To Limit TV For Youngest
headline.seo: TV Limits for Children Urged by American Academy of Pediatrics
